📰 Magazine Article.description: Informative articles from lifestyle, science, or general interest magazines

📄 Newspaper Article.description: News articles, feature stories, and opinion pieces

📖 Novel Extract.description: Excerpts from contemporary fiction showing character development

✍️ Personal Blog Post.description: First-person accounts of experiences and reflections

🔬 Popular Science Article.description: Accessible explanations of scientific concepts and discoveries

🎭 Cultural Review.description: Reviews and commentary on books, films, art, or performances

💼 Professional Feature.description: Articles about careers, workplace trends, and professional development

🏠 Lifestyle Feature.description: Articles about home, family, hobbies, and personal interests

🌍 Travel Writing.description: Descriptive accounts of places, cultures, and travel experiences

📚 Educational Feature.description: Informative articles about learning, education, and skill development
